name: so-case-manager-userscript
author: Henry Ecker (https://github.com/HenryEcker)
description: Help facilitate and track collaborative plagiarism cleanup efforts

scripts.build: npm run lint && vite build -c vite.config.js && vite build -c vite-min.config.js
scripts.bump-patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run build
scripts.bump-minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run build
